overview: As a recent graduate of Mick Blue's class, Selena Rose is convinced by Mick that she has the power of persuasion. While Mick is mainly looking to scam the luscious Latina out of a few bucks, he also scores a super hot sex session with the model. With her new found 'power' Selena is able to 'convince' Giovanni Francesco to dip into his girlfriend Tara Lynn Foxx for a pleasurable pussy stretching. Karlo Karrera is the next to fall for Selena, when her horny friend London Keyes is in need of a deep dicking from hung stud Mr. Pete. Selena distracts Karlo by serving up an erotic encounter. When Selena's friend Nikki Seven is having a tiff with her boyfriend, James Deen, Selena offers some advice to bring them back together for some hardcore make-up sex.
tagline: She can talk you into anything
title: Hypnosis
